text: Penthema is an east Asian genus of satyrine butterflies."Penthema Doubleday, [1848]" at Markku Savela's Lepidoptera and Some Other Life Forms ==Species== *Penthema adelma (C. & R. Felder, 1862) China. *Penthema binghami Wood-Mason, 1881 – blue kaiser Burma, Thailand *Penthema darlisa Moore, 1878 *Penthema formosanum Rothschild, 1898 *Penthema lisarda (Doubleday, 1845) – yellow kaiser ==References== Category:Satyrinae Category:Butterfly genera Category:Taxa named by Edward Doubleday
title: Penthema
